resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.

fields.summary: Tool to estimate resource requirements of an application pipeline based on prior executions

fields.description: The figures in the documentation for the Resource Estimator tool is missing in HADOOP-14840. This jira tracks adding them.
fields.summary: Add missing figures to Resource Estimator tool

comments.body: Also rename {{Apache Resource Estimator Service}} --> {{Apache Hadoop Resource Estimator Service}} in pom for consistency.
